LITINAS, K. LUCHNER, U. SCHLAG, T. SCHMIDT, P. SCHUBERT, I.A. SPARKS, J. SPOONER, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXV (Nos 4442-4493). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 85.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1998, 8°, xii-212 pp. et XX pll., dont 6 dépl. ISBN 0-85698-130-3.

P. Oxy. LXV, 4442-4493. - I. Theological Texts (4442-4449). - II. Literary Texts (4450-4460). - III. Texts with Musical Notation (4461-4467). - IV. Magic, Religion and Astrology (4468-4477). - V. Documentary Texts (4478-4493).
C.R. par Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 75 (2000) No. 150, pp. 348-352. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 73 (2001) pp. 1-5. - George M. Parássoglou, Hellenika 49 (1999) pp. 164-166.
